attributes.action: Push a zero tollerance policy which deals with anti-social and yobbish behaviour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent uprising of yobbish gang behaviour, vandalism, young criminals, and troublemakers has got to stop. It's a cancer on our society, and we must put a stop to it through zero tollerance policies before it wipes out the good and hard working people who pay taxes, who don't leech off the state, and would do anything not to be harassed on a daily basis by these yobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
